definitions.title: vb. Pi.
definitions.body: cry out for help (Gerb:33 thinks denom. from [[שֵׁוְעָה]], and this from √ akin to [[ישׁע]] deliver);—Pf. 1 S. [[שִׁוַּעְתִּי]] Ps 30:3 + 3 t.; Impf. 3 fs. [[תְּשַׁוֵּ֑עַ]] Job 24:12; 2 ms. [[תְּשַׁוַּע]] Is 58:9, etc.; Inf. cstr. sf. [[שַׁוְּעִי]] Ps 28:2, Ps 31:23; [[שַׁוְעִי]] Ps 5:3 (Ol:§ 182 d), etc.; Pt. [[מְשַׁוֵּ֑עַ]] Ps 72:12, Job 29:12;—cry for help: abs. Ps 72:12, Job 19:7, Job 24:12, Job 29:12, Job 30:28, Job 35:9, + Is 38:13 Houb Lo Che Du al. (for [[שִׁוִּיתִי]]); specif. to God Ps 5:3, Ps 18:42, Ps 119:147, Job 36:13, Is 58:9, Jon 2:3, Hb Hab 1:2, La 3:8; c. [[אל]] Ps 18:7, Ps 22:25, Ps 28:2 = Ps 31:23, Ps 30:3, Ps 88:14 + v:Ps 88:2 (rd. with Weir [[אֱלֽהַי שִׁוַּעְתִּי יוֹם חַעֲקָתִי]]), Job 30:20, Job 38:41.
